subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Michael Bradley sprained his left ankle before Friday’s loss to Costa Rica, and Geoff Cameron, Matt Besler and Jozy Altidore each received a yellow card and drew a one-game suspension.
snippet: Michael Bradley sprained his left ankle before Friday’s loss to Costa Rica, and Geoff Cameron, Matt Besler and Jozy Altidore each received a yellow card and drew a one-game suspension.
